reference.title: (IISMonitor) Microsoft Internet Information Server
reference.shortdesc: The ZenPacks.zenoss.IISMonitor ZenPack uses Windows Perfmon to collect performance metrics from Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS).

section.p: No agent need be installed on IIS servers to collect the following metrics.

li.p: Standard: GET, HEAD, POST, CGI, ISAPI
WebDAV: PUT, COPY, MOVE, DELETE, OPTIONS, PROPFIND, PROPPATCH, MKCOL
